name: Connection to the Divine : Shroud of Punishment

system.description:
At 6th level, your dualistic abilities continue to develop. When you chose your path, you designate a number of creatures equal to your proficiency bonus. You and the selected creatures benefit as follows:

Shroud of Punishment

If you choose Path of the Dark, whenever you or one of the selected creatures deals damage while within the area of your gloom, you can choose to have the attack deal additional damage equal to your intelligence modifier. This extra damage can only occur once per round.
